text: Ra Anumzamo'a Jerusalemi kumamofo kuma kegina tapage hutrenigeno haviza haniegu agesa antahi'ne. Ana nehuno nofi avazuhumpi huno anteno keteno, azama rusuteno kuma keginama eri havizama hunaku'ma nehia azana eri onamagi'neanki rusuteno, kuma keginane, manisga hu'nezama ha'ma nehaza nonena eri haviza higeke zanasunku nehuke zavi ate'na'e.
